reviews.text: Very good, very realistic, uncanny as someone said in ELR. Just a hint too sweet to be ADV for me, but four stars wouldn't do justice to this recipe, so five it is.
doesnt the ori have 1% banana cream?
Hopefully Wayne posts all his own stuff someday. Apologies, and thanks for sharing!
This is one of favorite recipes by Wayne, although I usually mix it with a little less AP and a little more Cream Fresh to make it more suited to my tastes. Thank you for taking the time to share it.
Ok I thought I was out of line by commenting on someone else's recipes that was doing the same thing, not meant to be a dumping ground of reposted recipes keep em private
